results.deck: Peter Dille was the Senior Vice President of Marketing at SCEA. While Dille was an integral part in the launch of the PlayStation brand, he did leave Sony for THQ in 1999 before returning in 2006, and consequently leaving again in 2011.
results.name: Peter Dille
